==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|虎|落|笛}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=もがりぶえ|虎落|tr1=mogari|t1=a type of bamboo fence|笛|tr2=fue|t2=flute}}. The ''fue'' reading for {{l|ja|笛}} changes to ''bue'' due to {{rendaku|もがりぶえ}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|もがりぶえ}}

# winter [[wind]] blowing through a bamboo fence, making a [[flute]]-like noise

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|虎落|もがり}}: a [[fence]] made of [[bamboo]] tied together with [[rope]]
